scenario_text.value: Gabumon, can I talk with you?
With me? About what?
(What should I say to Gabumon?)
We’re counting on you.
Let’s beat the Master!
Protect the professor.
We’re counting on you.

Pretty soon this will all be over, and we’ll
be counting on you to the very end.
Yeah, I know.

You’ve all done so much for me, and I intend
to repay you for that now.

I am going to fight against the Master with
all I have, together with all of you.
Thanks, that means a lot.
Let’s beat the Master!
Let’s go out there and beat the Master!
Yeah, you said it!

With Akiharu and all of you fighting at my
side, I think we can actually do it!
Protect the professor.

We’ll be counting on you to protect the
professor.

Hah, of all the things for you to say. You
know I’ll keep him safe.

Even if all the rest of you fall, I’ll
protect Akiharu if it’s the last thing I do!
Uh... That’s...good?
Sorry, that’s taking things a bit far.

I’ll look out for all of you too. After all,
I owe you a lot.
Gabumon...

Ugh, what an embarrassing thing to say!
Forget I mentioned that!

Hey, you sure I’m the one you should be
talking to right now?
What do you mean?

It’s just...why don’t you go talk more with
your friends?

Don’t be ridiculous. You’re one of our
friends, too.

What?! You mean, you really think... That is,
uh...

Gah, what is wrong with me? What even is this
feeling?!

Look, we’re coming up on the final battle.
Focus on that!
Haha, okay.
Forget about me. Go talk with the others.
